overview:
Mark Sims founded Nanorex in the spring of 2004. Mark is a seasoned entrepreneur and experienced technology executive with a track record of success.

In 1992 Mark founded Netrex, the first pure-play Internet security services company to experience exponential revenue growth. As a self-funded company of more than 160 employees, Netrex was acquired by Internet Security Systems in 1999. From 1986 to 1991, Mark worked as a computer graphics engineer for Sun Microsystems. Mark holds a BS in Computer Aided Design from Eastern Michigan University. In 2000, he graduated from Harvard Business School’s Owners and Presidents Management program.
